participant_1.background:
I eat my feelings.
I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best.
i like spreading laughter and love everywhere i go.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

participant_2.background:
My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore.
i collect little figurines.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
i still love to line dry my clothes.
i like going on walks.

content.text: Hello.  How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright.  I'm trying to work on a new story.
It's a fairytale.  I'm hoping to inspire others with it.
That's wonderful.  I'm sure it will be great.
Thank you.  I hope so.  I want to make a living doing what I love.
I wish you the best of luck.  I'm sure you can do it.
Thank you.  I appreciate it.  What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go for walks, collect little figurines, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies.  I'm not much of a walker, but I do like to collect things.
What do you like to collect?
I like to collect books.  I have a large library in my home.
That's awesome.  I love to read too.  I wish I had more time to read.
You should make time for reading.  It's a great way to relax and learn new things.
I know, you're right.  I'll try to read more.
